## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalues">PhiValues</a></>}>
Class for calculating and caching the underlying values of phis in a function. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalues/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalues/phivaluescallbackvh">PhiValuesCallbackVH</a></>}>
A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbackvh">CallbackVH</a> to notify <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalues">PhiValues</a> when a value is deleted or replaced, so that the cached information for that value can be cleared to avoid dangling pointers to invalid values. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalues/phivaluescallbackvh/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivaluesanalysis">PhiValuesAnalysis</a></>}>
The analysis pass which yields a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalues">PhiValues</a>. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivaluesanalysis/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivaluesprinterpass">PhiValuesPrinterPass</a></>}>
A pass for printing the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalues">PhiValues</a> for a function. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivaluesprinterpass/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalueswrapperpass">PhiValuesWrapperPass</a></>}>
Wrapper pass for the legacy pass manager. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalueswrapperpass/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This file defines the PhiValues class, and associated passes, which can be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// used to find the underlying values of the phis in a function, i.e. the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// non-phi values that can be found by traversing the phi graph.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This information is computed lazily and cached. If new phis are added to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function they are handled correctly, but if an existing phi has its operands</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// modified PhiValues has to be notified by calling invalidateValue.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Whenever a phi has its operands modified the cached values for that phi</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (and the phis that use that phi) become invalid. A user of PhiValues has</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The analysis pass which yields a PhiValues</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The analysis does nothing by itself, and just returns an empty PhiValues</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">/// which will get filled in as it&#39;s used.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A pass for printing the PhiValues for a function.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This pass doesn&#39;t print whatever information the PhiValues happens to hold,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">/// but instead first uses the PhiValues to analyze all the phis in the function</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">/// so the complete information is printed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivaluesprinterpass"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivaluesprinterpass/#abdbf0f188b2ab833efd03df805956980">PhiValuesPrinterPass</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passinfomixin">PassInfoMixin</a>&lt;PhiValuesPrinterPass&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
